message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.SI, cs.DB. 

This paper proposes a method for improving recommender systems by incorporating knowledge graphs. As such, it could fit into several arXiv CS sub-categories. 

- cs.LG (Machine Learning): This is the most likely category as the paper proposes a novel approach that uses graph neural networks to learn personalized item embeddings. 
- cs.IR (Information Retrieval): Recommender systems are a type of information retrieval system, and the paper discusses how incorporating knowledge graphs can improve recommendations. 
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence): The paper proposes an AI-based approach for improving recommender systems. 
- cs.SI (Social and Information Networks): The paper uses a graph-based approach to incorporate knowledge graphs into recommender systems. 
- cs.DB (Databases): The paper discusses how knowledge graphs can be used to improve recommender systems, which could be seen as a database application.
